area.key: For geocoded data use 'Address' as a column name
Label is case-sensitive. Reference column names using {} notation. Will default to the first column display name
Display data as a list view. This overrides any label value defined above
Importing will overwrite all existing data
Set references to other properties on this node - changes to the source column in this Tabulate instance will update the target column
Repositioning the marker will update the stored lat/lng pair, but will not modify the address text
